overview: Steve Page has been focused on the healthcare universe within finance for the past 10 years. Prior to joining Ascend, Steve was Vice President in Investment Banking at Goldman Sachs & Co in the Healthcare Mergers & Acquisitions and Leveraged Finance groups. He received a BBA degree in Finance from the University of Texas at Austin and an MBA degree from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania. He earned a Chartered Financial Analyst designation in 1998.
